html: Last Friday, I held a field hearing in #Tampa on protecting #Florida's small businesses in the premium cigar industry from harmful overregulation. Thank you @FOXNews13 for covering this important bipartisan initiative —>pic.twitter.com/sw6ZQl6L9H

html: Lady Bradley is a beautiful 170lb loggerhead turtle. She was entangled in a trap line off the upper #FloridaKeys last November. But she has made a full recovery thanks to @TurtleHospital. Today I was in #SombreroBeach as she returned to her ocean home. #Sayfiepic.twitter.com/AYVMkjm4uu
text:
Lady Bradley is a beautiful 170lb loggerhead turtle. 

She was entangled in a trap line off the upper #FloridaKeys last November. But she has made a full recovery thanks to @TurtleHospital.

Today I was in #SombreroBeach  as she returned to her ocean home.

#Sayfiepic.twitter.com/AYVMkjm4uu

html: First visited canals in #MarathonFlorida right after #HurricaneIrma. Then went to D.C. to get the $ to clean them up. Visited a 2nd time when work began on clean up. Today came for the 3rd time. 142 of 172 canals have been cleared of debris. #Sayfiepic.twitter.com/kKGukYnp0n
text:
First visited canals in #MarathonFlorida right after #HurricaneIrma. Then went to D.C. to get the $ to clean them up.

Visited a 2nd time when work began on clean up.

Today came for the 3rd time. 142 of 172 canals have been cleared of debris. 

#Sayfiepic.twitter.com/kKGukYnp0n

text:
A bipartisan supermajority in the Senate is poised to pass my bill S.1 which includes the Combating BDS Act. Given the misleading arguments & amount of misinformation being spread by opponents of the bill, it's worth clarifying what it does.

html: Ahead of the one year anniversary of the tragic shooting in #Parkland, I am re-introducing my bipartisan #RedFlag bill that will empower law enforcement & family to use the judicial system to keep guns out of the hands of dangerous individuals. text:
Ahead of the one year anniversary of the tragic shooting in #Parkland, I am re-introducing my bipartisan #RedFlag bill that will empower law enforcement & family to use the judicial system to keep guns out of the hands of dangerous individuals.
